ygData.subject: RE: 1hb vs. 2hb (was: Question)

name=GENERATOR></HEAD> <BODY> <DIV><FONT color=#0000ff face=Arial
size=2><SPAN class=459094016-05101999>Is it just my mail reader, or are all
of Sirensa's e-mails sent to us in Kanji?</SPAN></FONT></DIV> <BLOCKQUOTE>
<DIV align=left class=OutlookMessageHeader dir=ltr><FONT face=Tahoma
size=2>-----Original Message-----<BR><B>From:</B> Sirensa Qi'Seraph
[mailto:Sirensa@...]<BR><B>Sent:</B> 1999/10/05 12:41
PM<BR><B>To:</B> EQ-Clerics@onelist.com<BR><B>Subject:</B> Re: [EQ-Clerics]
1hb vs. 2hb (was: Question)<BR><BR></DIV></FONT>
I would agree it is a personal choice :) At level 40 I have both 1HB and
2HB skills at about 100 which is about half of max for my level - and
honestly this is because for the past 15-20 levels I don't melee - hardly
ever. Weapon/Shield slots for me are used to gain as much +wis as possible
;) I can whack a MOB if necessary - but I usually cast.

~Siren
</BLOCKQUOTE></BODY></HTML>
